name: Space Dice (Xansta, PixelClef)
description:
We took the multiplayer Starship Bridge Simulator engine and created a single player game based on random factors in the spirit of "Roll of the Dice" theme. Because the EE engine is designed for multiplayer, there are a couple of setup steps to go through when you start. See the _Quick_Start.txt file for details

Shoot the bad guys (they'll certainly shoot you), take on missions, upgrade your ship, destroy the base that's the source of all your troubles.

If you want to find other players to play the other scenarios that are designed to be multiplayer, join us at the USN Discord: https://discord.gg/7Kr32ezJFF
